title: UAE grocery prices set to drop as retailers permanently slash prices on 10,000 essentials
summary_full: Choithrams is implementing a permanent price reduction on thousands of everyday essentials across the UAE, aiming for "everyday lower pricing" rather than temporary promotions. This strategic move, affecting around 10,000 products with average cuts of 15%, seeks to provide predictable savings for consumers, especially ahead of Ramadan.
